content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work sometime around 9:40 at night traveling eastward on highway 4. i looked to the left and noticed the lights that seemed to be fairly low over the bay. i first thought it was a airplane or hellicopter since the concord airport was only a few miles away. the 3 lights were small star like, 2 outer light flashing, inner light not. the lights stayed in place not moving for several minutes as i was now driving into pittsburg; which is why i began to think it was not a aiplane or hellicopter. i also noticed there was no other colored lights. as i was entering antioch and checked to my left again, the lights were now traveling eastward no longer at the angle but horizontal and the lights were no longer flashing but solid. i lost track of it for a few minutes but as i pulled into my street, which is a court, the end is open facing the freeway north, i could see the lights. it seemed to turn/spin around so that 3 larger lights now faces me. so i guess the small star like lights in back to the large basketball size lights in front. it then moved a little westward after that and i was barely able to see it through the trees. moments after a hellicopter with red and green or blue light traveled from southwest to north in direction of lights. i couldn't see anything after that from my house because the trees obstructed view.
content.summary: 3 small lights observed over the bay at about 45 degree angle not moving, w outer light flashing. then all lights stop flashing as it traveled eastward down bay.

content.detailedDescription: I woke this morning at exactly 05:32 am.I set my alarm for 6 am, but am routinely awake before that. i had heated a cup of yesterdays coffee and had sat in my recliner and started watching the 1980's movie with mathew broderick "war games". my day generally starts in this manner, pryor to my daily exercise routines. i have the habit of sitting watching the sun rise, and the morning weather conditions from first the kitchen window and then from the position of my recliner looking from the living room picture window. this morning as the light of day became obvious i realized the sky was gray and overcast. to gaze out the window from my recliner i have to look over my right shoulder. this morning i noticed from my position a light in the sky that i at first thought was a morning star. that was my immediate reaction but at the same time i knew i was wrong in my assumption. i realized it was much larger and brighter than a star, and the only object visible with the backdrop of overcast skies. i mentioned the oddity to my wife who had moved out to the couch and was lying dozing, waiting for my alarm. she refused to get up and look out the window, thinking i was trying to irritate her. i glanced at the time and it was 5:58 am by this time. my attention was back on the movie as my 6 am alarm went off. in the process of dismissing the alarm on my phone i glanced out the window and noticed the object had changed position but was still motionless. the object still had a super sized star like appearance. from my chair the object was visible at an approximate 45 degree angle. at this point i was unsure whether the object had actually moved, so in an attempt to justify reasoning i changed numerous positions in my chair to prove to myself that the object had remained stationary. it was obvious it had not. i mentioned this again to my wife, and from the couch she told me to stifle it. my attention went back to the movie momentarily, but my curiosity made me look to the object again which i realized had changed position once again. my thoughts went to air traffic. the flight path over our home runs in a east to west pattern.  there is a lot of air traffic in our area from private to commercial, and military. most recently a marine unit of ossprey aircraft landed at our airport flying just 200 feet over our rooftop. this object had no characteristics of any craft i have seen in my lifetime. my interest was peeked at this point and my wife continued her protests from the couch. two more times my attention was drawn away from the object and during these brief occasions the object changed position. i did not witness its moving and i continued to try and rationalize the situation. if i try and judge distance on a numerical scale from my position thru the glass of my window i can only surmise the change in positions to a totall of 6 inches in travel at a eastern position at an angle of 60 degrees in travel. then what occurred  next made me realize this situation may be questionable on a total different level. suddenly the star like object disappeared from sight from its last stationary position. i immediately jumped from my chair, pulled on some shorts and headed outdoors to get a better view and to locate the object. the sky was still overcast in appearance with underlying lower cloud formations and this is where things became sensational to my senses....And probably unreal to most. i witnessed a partially obscured stationary, blimp like dark, not shiny, not reflecting, no flashing lights, craft with what appeared to be a fixed appendage at the visible end of the object, on the top side. it looked like a shark fin. black in color like the blimp shape of the object. although similar to the tail section of a airliner or smaller aircraft, this sat in what i perceived as a reverse position and angled towards the obscured center of the craft or object. i can not reasonably judge the distance or the size. look at a ruler or tape and what i was able to witness was slightly less than a quarter inch in length. by the time i ran back inside and returned with a camera and phone the object was no longer visible. when i went inside to retrieve a device i glanced at the clock and the time was 6:11 am. i have not seen any objects since and the sky's remain overcast at the time of this report.
content.summary: From recliner, looked over shoulder through large window and noticed object, what i first thought was a morning star. my attention returned to television program briefly, i looked back towards light in sky and realized it's position had changed in sky .

content.detailedDescription: i was in backyard observing meteor shower the news said that between 2:30 and 4:30 best viewing time. so i went out back to check it out. about ten minutes go by a bright object fell from sky thats didn'twhen what looked to me like aircarrier. it was also low it reflected the city lights didn't make a sound i was in amazement. i turned to look at my wife to ask her if she saw what flew over she pointing up eyes wide open. we said nobody is going to believe us i was glad she saw it to.The whole event took ten seconds,i did notice some hyrogliffs i seen on your show.
content.summary: It happened a meteor shower this huge ship seemed to or looked to intercept falling object.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed because it was way past time for me to go to sleep but i wasn't tired. so i was scrolling through facebook for a little while and then i locked my phone and i looked at my window. as soon as i looked out my window i saw this green/blue glowing thing that almost looked like a comet falling from the sky and it looked like it landed in the trailer park on the next street over from mine but i don't know if it landed because there are trees in the way. i noticed it because it was so bright and it's very dark outside as it was 2:27am. as soon as i processed what i just saw i immediately thought it was aliens. my dogs and other dogs on my street all started barking and i started hearing noises then i was like omg i'm filing a ufo report.
content.summary: I was looking out my window and i saw it falling to the ground

content.detailedDescription: See description
content.summary: Around the age of 12 had a dream  with room with white lights woke up with alien face birth mark below adam's apple disappeared at age 17

content.detailedDescription: Phoenix lights were not only in phoenix. we were in 11 mile corner a small neighborhood in between casa grande and coolidge, az. the exact location, if you want to look up on a map was mira vista st. a few blocks from mary c. obrien elementary.  we observed lights and continued playing catch in the street under a street light, it was dark out, maybe 7:30-8:30 and we saw the light kept getting closer, the lights passed right over us. as it passed we thought it was an airplane formation, then we realized that it blocked out the barely visible clouds reflecting off the moon, it was hard to tell the actual shape, but it was most recognizably a triangle. myself and my sisters have spoke of it a few times regarding stuff we saw of tv and how the afb claimed it was flares. we saw these same lights about 45 miles south in the middle of the desert in a small neighborhood. it was very slow moving.(without scale) a little faster than you see an airplane pass over at high altitude... this was in between cloud cover and the floor, elevation was unknown. it made a direct pass from south to north, after it passed over we resumed to play catch. we know there is an airport south of us in eloy. it did not make a sound, absolute silence, we stood perfectly still to try and hear the engines rev, nothing at all. not really taking in what we saw as a ufo, though the word was passed around a few times. after seeing the speculations on tv a few years back, i kept thinking why is the air force lying, i figure it was a top secret aircraft. i still believe that so to this day. but with all of mufon's resources and collaborating stories, maybe you guys can nail down exactly what it was. good luck, email me with any questions you have, i'd be happy to share any info i have. i have 4 other witnesses, and my sisters might remember who else was out there with us, because i do not. this is not a claim to fame, i do not want to go on tv and look like a loon. this is just an itch i have had bothering me for a while. this was only 5 lights, one my sisters thought it was 7 but i remember counting out 5. not sure if that helps.
content.summary: We saw lights and thought it was a few planes flying in formation until it passed over and blocked the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come home from a two hour return trip home from visiting my grandkids. it was around 9-9:30 in the evening. i stepped out on my back porch to smoke, when....For the third time in two months, this extremely bright white light just turned on, like it was saying "here i am". the light cast no light on very few whispy clouds around it. as it had in the past, it stayed on for 4-5 seconds then slowly went out. i saw what looked like a cigar shaped dark figure behind the light. it was so very bright that it was hard to see past the light. there was no noise before or after and nothing around me was electrically effected. my dog was inside, so she didn't bark. like the other two times, it was approximately at a very low whispy cloud level....Maybe 400 feet up.....I'm not good with measuring above the ground, but it was much closer than a biplane would fly. it was a clear night with a few thin very low lying misty like clouds. i had only been on my porch one to two minutes before it lit up. the light is like  basketball size and completely round, but cast no light around it. this is my third encounter with this same thing. i reported it the first time and lou gagnon from va took on my case. somehow his email was gone from my phone, so i didn't know how to contact him, again. the first time that these lights appeared very low to both my mother and i. at that time it went behind another low lying cloud, to come out a total of three times. it always stays on for a slow 4-5seconds then goes off, to light up again coming out behind a low cloud, to turn on again. the second time, it was about the same height as usual and only came on once. never a sound to be heard. it's so close that the light stays on much longer than a blinking planes lights, it's also way to low.  the third time this happened, on last wednesday, i was totally caught off guard and it frightened me terribly. this feels very personal, to me, like it wants me to see it. that may sound weird, but no weirder than it coming a third time. i am baffled. i'm scared and other odd things are happening in the skies  in front of my deck, that i've never seen before. many nights,i will see what looks like a bright star, very high up and think that it's odd that it wasn't there a minute ago. the light will slowly fall and then fade out, like a flare. i've seen this a dozen times, with my elderly mom seeing it once. there has been extremely bright planes coming from the western sky.... all from the same place....That are so bright that they look like search planes. they turn to the south, as they approach my complex and then head south. it may be four at a time. there has been more, what looks like military planed, flying in twos, that i have ever seen before. in the past month, i had my cable wifi and tv updated to x1. when i downloaded the apps that everyone downloads for streaming, my google account was taken over by "linux". i couldn't do anything with my phone because this linux took over my google account, so my phone wouldn't recognize me. after hours of trying to get into my google account, i finally saw that that operating system had put itself as the primary owner of my phone! my device wouldn't recognize me, so i couldn't use my emails or banking app. as soon as i saw this, i took off all of the x1 apps, and low and behold, my phone was mine again. i called cable and worked my way up to the app issue department. they ran a test on my phone to match every ip address that i used on my phone, or accessed myphone. at first they said there was evidence that someone had tampered with my phone. hours later, after they checked all of my sites, they called and said that all was fine. they sent me to the security department for help, who is now researching my phone.
i'm not sure if i'm paranoid, at this point, but odd things are happening. three times to see this up close "spotlight" with a craft behind it, is very disconcerting. i'm afraid that noone will believe me. i'm really scared of this thing coming back. noone is around when it comes on and if someone in my apartment complex has seen this, i don't know about it. i sent mr. gagnon my drawing from the first night that my mom and i saw it, together. he asked me some questions, to which i responded. somehow his email is gone and i can't reach him to discuss this new activity and extremely high flare like things...And the planes flying in groups of two, which i've never seen. the planes coming in from the west are usually about 10 minutes apart, and are so very bright that it looks as if there are several venuses in the sky.
i just want to know that me and my mom are safe. i'm scared of this silent "flood light" thing coming on at me, when i go on my porch. my dog has woken me up several times looking out my door and growling. she doesn't behave that way. again, i may be a little paranoid after this third visit. that 3rd visit was no coincidence.... nor the second one. someone please call me so i can give youmore detailed information on what i'm seeing. thank you so much. at least i have someone to tell that may believe me, without judgement of my mental stability.... which is fine. i have been a nurse since i was 20. thanks again and please let me know if anyone else from the richmond virginia area has seen weird things
content.summary: For the third time, in two months, i stepped on my porch to see a bright whitr light turn on in thr sky, only a few hundred feet above me. silent, very bright, five seconds the off and object was gone.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: we were driving home from a dinner out, as we are passing chula vista high school  my granddaughter called out, what are those lights in the sky? she gets frightened, starts rolling up the windows, locked the doors. i look up as i pull over i had to pull over because i found myself stopping the car in the middle of the street i pulled over kept looking up sticking my head out of the window as the lights one by one started disappearing there were three when we saw them until they completely disappeared. the sky was completely dark, no clouds, no stars the lights were just gone.They had turned off one by one.  when we got home i called the police department to ask if there had been any other reports of anything odd in the skies they told me no but offered to give me the phone number to faa, i declined. my granddaughter and her friend are 16 years old, we know what we saw. after i posted my information on facebook, i had several other friends who also live in the area who saw the same thing.
content.summary: I was driving south on 4th ave. when granddaughter yells, as she's yelling i look up to observe lights in a triangular pattern until they turned off one by one. i had to pull over to side of road i was in awe of what i was seeing.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My mother was outside with grandson. and looked up into the sky and saw lights. and one of my friends also saw the lights when he was leaving his friends house so he recorded the sighting.
content.summary: Mother saw lights in a circle path ran in to call people then ran back out and it was gone. and  a friend recored a video seeing the same sighting.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:20 pm when i went outside to smoke. i first heard a very loud rumbling noise that shook the house very slightly. my first take was that a really huge jet must be flying very low over the house, which would be unusual. i stepped out onto the deck and looked up, not seeing anything at first. as i walked out further on the deck, i looked  straight up and  behind me, and saw what seemed to be a light colored elongated octagonal craft with a solid orange light at each corner (as if the elongated octogon were actually a rectangle) and a large red blinking light at the center of the craft. it moved very slowly from due west toward due east at an altitude that i would guestimate was around 1000 ft. i grabbed my binoculars and watched it for about a minute, although as it was steadily moving away from me, i couldnt discern any other features other than ive described. the object was flat.  i could hear it before it had gotten to be directly overhead. the sound was a loud low rumble. when i had come inside to grab my binoculars, my wife came out with me and also observed the object. we watched it for about two to two and a half minutes, until its line of sight fell below the tops of the neighboring houses.
content.summary: Elongated octogon with orange solid lights and a red blinking light with very loud rumbling noise

content.detailedDescription: Me friend and i had just finised running at around 8:05 pm . we started getting our stuff to leave when my friend point out 4 lights in the distance moving together like a group. at first i thought it was a cellular tower that i have never noticed before but then i realized the  area that i was looking at is all suburban homes . the i thought maybe it was an airplane or helicopter but they were flying way to close together to be that . then i thought about my grandpa who always talks about  ufos and stuff like this so i remember that you should alway get some type of evidence. that is when i got my phone and took a picture but they i realized a video would be a lot better . by the time i started recording the objects had stopped moving and now where just there in the sky still really close together . then finally one by one they stared disappearing clock wise . i kept recording until they all disappeared and even waited a couple of seconds after just in case anything else happened. this all happened in the time frame of about 2-3 minutes. after the sighting i couldn't believe what had happened i was actually really calm even though in the video it won't seem like it because i was really scared and calm at the same time it was weird .
content.summary: I saw 4 bright starlike objects in the distance moving together then they stopped moving and one by one started disappearing

content.detailedDescription: me and fiance were playing our online game on 09/03/15 at 8:15pm.The way we have our pc set up is that we both share a larger desk for both our set ups.The desk is set up for a corner desk so it sit in a corner of our room.In front of our desk is our window not a great view just the other building in front of us.But since we are on the top floor we do see a little of the skyline. i can only tell you  what i saw and here it goes. i was playing my game trying to get credits for a investment i wanted to go for. when i heard my fiance say "whats that ". as i looked at him i noticed he was looking out the window. as i looked to what he was watching i noticed 4 orb's looking objects going in a counter clock wise motion. the middle of the orb was a bright white with what looked like a red orange edg to it. and it also left a very short trail at the end of it. as i said it was fadeing going in a counter clock wise motion and as it did one by one started to fade. so if you were looking at a clock it would be 12, 3 6 and 9 on a clock. i notice that as they faded that it was also going  counter clock wise. so that when number 9 disappear i jumped on a bucket we had in our room and when i did that i saw the 5th orb sitting on the bottom of the others. it disappear with number 6 and the the last one did the same . we did not hear no noice nor did we hear any planes going by us that was weird cause traffic in our area is always busy. we live abouth 3 or 4 miles from a very busy airport. last but not least we heard our first plane since this  happen it is now 9:25 pm. this is my second sighting. crazy what is really going on  here. i know nwo
content.summary: 5 orbs size of a quarter from my distance were going in a counter clockwise motion with a slight trail behind it.As this was happeing one by one each one faded away . went out side and found nothing

content.detailedDescription: Me friend and i had just finised running at around 8:05 pm . we started getting our stuff to leave when my friend point out 4 lights in the distance moving together like a group. at first i thought it was a cellular tower that i have never noticed before but then i realized the  area that i was looking at is all suburban homes . the i thought maybe it was an airplane or helicopter but they were flying way to close together to be that . then i thought about my grandpa who always talks about  ufos and stuff like this so i remember that you should alway get some type of evidence. that is when i got my phone and took a picture but they i realized a video would be a lot better . by the time i started recording the objects had stopped moving and now where just there in the sky still really close together . then finally one by one they stared disappearing clock wise . i kept recording until they all disappeared and even waited a couple of seconds after just in case anything else happened. this all happened in the time frame of about 2-3 minutes. after the sighting i couldn't believe what had happened i was actually really calm even though in the video it won't seem like it because i was really scared and calm at the same time it was weird .
content.summary: I saw 4 bright starlike objects in the distance moving together then they stopped moving and one by one started disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was able to catch on video the last two lights but there was a total of 5 that formed a diamond shape.. very bright lights pulsated and had a shape.. 4 of us saw them.. no sound or hums.. definately not a plane or chopper. the direction was east of my location and guessing it was around towards brown field
content.summary: A total of 5 balls of light forming a diamond shape and shutting down and turning off

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and went out on the deck located on the east side of my house.  i could observe the object to the west well above the roof of my house.  my wife and i were looking at the red clouds created by the sun setting.  the wife thought it was remnants of a cloud, but it had square corners and well defined edges.  it remained stationary for the entire sighting.  no unnatural feelings or lost time.
object in the west between clouds,in clear sky.  rectangle, one unit by two units in size.  the vertical element being the longer. the east side was lit.  the sun was below the horizon and shouldn't be shining on the east side.  object remained still with no sound. observed about 1 minute and then it just dissolved. i am an air force vet that has worked on multiple aircraft.  also a private pilot.  this was no aircraft that i have ever seen.
content.summary: Sun set. looking west. object was lit on east side. object just desolved.

content.detailedDescription: I work security on a ranch out in heurfano county, east of walsenburg on a night shift. for two nights in a row now i have seen a red orb in the same spot in the sky at roughly the same time each night, around 2-4 am. it is due east of my location where there were multiple cattle mutilations last year, out towards a blinking red tower of some sort. it randomly fades in bright red and stays so for some minutes until it fades out for a few minutes. both times it has done so more than once and changed color to bright white. it makes quick little circles in the sky and zig zags from side to side. it seems to respond to thoughts somehow. the first night i also witnessed what appeared to me to be two black hawk helicopters in the area though i can not recall if i saw them before or after. they flew very low and close to my location. i am on shift now and will pay attention to the sky again tonight, 09/03/15. i do not doubt what i observed as i have been witness to sightings like this in the past. as a side note, i served 8 years in the army and feel confident the helicopters i saw were military and most likely black hawks.
content.summary: Bright red orb in sky

content.detailedDescription: On august 29, 2015, my parents, 3y/o daughter and i took 2 vehicles to altus, ok, about 40 miles from our hometown of vernon tx,  to take my mother out to eat for her birthday. ter my phone to watch a movie on the ride home in the back seat of my parents car. i drove my own car and they followed me home. later that night, i was looking in my phone and came across these pictures that took my breath away. my 3y/o daughter loves taking pictures and can work my phone better than i can. it appears that she took 2 pictures of an object that is vaguely seen. the shot #3 shows 3 glowing objects that look cylindrical. the shot #4 shows 1 cylindrical glowing object. the 5th shot shows 2 red streaks that appear as a tail of residual energy or emmision of some kind and the top tail has a small yellow orb inside! the next shot she took looks like a blank sky. i was in the car in front of them and i did not see anything but i was driving. i am astonished by these photos and that my toddler took them. i want to know if they are legitimate sighting photos. we were driving approximately 65-75 mph headed south. she was sitting on the drivers' side rear in a car seat, so i assume she took these out of the drivers side looking east. my phone information is as follows: samsung sch-s968c; aug 29, 2015; all shots @9:05pm; orientation:90ยบ; resolution: 3264x2448; flash: off; focal length: 3.7mm; white balance: auto; aperture: 2.6; exposure: 1/30; iso: 1600; pic#1: 401kb; #2 :386 kb; #3 :350kb; #4 :335kb; #5 :426kb; #6: 425kb
content.summary: 3y/o daughter took pics out of rear car door window

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing at snow cone stand one block from my home buying snow cones for neighbours. first one we saw was a blinking light around 8pm, traveling west to east. an airplane flying south to north, good distance away from ufo, caused the ufo to illuminate. after the airplane had flown beyond the path of the ufo, the ufo changed to a blinking light, then vanished, not to reappear. several standing with me became very excited to see the ufo and even more excited when it disappeared. it was only the first of many we saw. another passed directly overhead as a white dot, traveling west to east, in a straight path. witnesses made comment how fast it was traveling. next a group of objects all with blinking lights, traveled north to south, in a straight path. around 9:15pm we saw the best i've seen here. it was shaped like a trapezoid, with red pulsating lights, one red at the top, then descending down each side, stopping short of the bottom. at the bottom was a single line of white stationary lights. it was flying from the east going west at a very slow rate, slower than any airplane and it made no sound. the red lights were pulsating together, while the lower white lights remained solid. this one really got everyone's attention, going so slow and was very close to us. it was a very large aircraft. we lost sight of it behind some trees. it appeared to be slowing down. gave us the impression it was going to land out north of what everyone here calls jose's hill. a gravel county road which used to go all the way through to walnut springs and ulogy county roads. i say used to, because if has been closed off. that is the area in which the head overseer of the lockheed base lives. with the county road closed off, made into a private drive, there's no way of telling what's out that way.  wednesday night was a very exciting night, more exciting than tuesday night. we saw several on tuesday night as well, while standing at the snow cone stand, starting around 8pm, continuing past 10pm. mostly the same as wednesday night except for the trapezoid. wish i had the camera for that one.
content.summary: Multiple objects, various directions, w/e, n/s. e/w, s/n

content.detailedDescription:
9/3/2015

i had just left work at around 11:15 pm ( 9/2/2015 ) and i was on my way home . i got on the highway going 77 south  & as i was driving ,a light caught my eye . i looked up and in a distance , i saw a bright yellowish-orange light in the shape of a circle. i thought it might be a meteorite  . it didn't move . it then looked like it turned a little to where i saw some white lights on the side. i then thought it's an airplane or jet. but it turned back to where it was just the yellowish-orange circle again. i watched it 5 more minutes . then it faded away so quick that it looked like someone turned off a light. i got home and told my boyfriend about it. i then told my daughter the next day . finally i called channel 19 action news . no one had reported anything to the news channel . this is my first siting of what i think was a ufo !!!!!
my name is lisa johnson and i live in ohio .
content.summary: A bright yellowish orange ball of light in a cloudy sky. it looked like it turned sidways and saw some white lights also then it faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from a friends house and was driving east on ave p approaching 50th st e. ( 8:30 pm very dark, city lights behind me to the west) when out of nowhere, 2 extremely bright lights appeared at the exact same time. one over the other in a staggered position. this is the time that i pulled over. and i could see another vehicle two or three football fields in front of me pulled over. for reasons unknown. i would guess that time the lights were both 3 miles away from me to the east. then the light on top moved and was exactly above the other. then they  started to move in strange ways. but always in sync, and almost same distance from each other the entire time they danced. then  just one of the lights started moving west southwest, towards where i pulled over, it took a few minutes to get to me, my guess would be about 30 to 40 miles per hour. i will also guess it was about three quarters of a mile above me. it never stopped, never wavered, it just flew very slow and very straight, mind you the other light it was dancing with is still hovering in the exact same place it was before.  the entire time of the dance i was trying to plug in my phone and snap a picture, or better yet a video. but i had less than 5% battery life so i could not snap a picture or take a video. but my phone worked enough, & i called my girlfriend who was not close enough to see anything, but that is how i know the event was at 8:37 p.M. because i looked at the time i called her. as it flew over at a very very slow pace, (i now see its a somewhat triangular shape craft) i could not hear anything and i hear these planes over my head all day long. even after it was about two miles past me, still could not hear a thing. but the other light was still shining very very brightly in the same exact spot. i hang up with my girlfriend, and started to drive home once again.( entire event lasted 8 to 12 minutes) since i was driving i could not constantly keep my eyes on the stationary craft to the east, ( i am now driving north, after taking a left on 50th street east, now with the stationary object to my right) after about 4 minutes of driving north i could not see the craft to my right any longer. 






lol that was a very interesting drive home after the event. i have always believed there is life in the cosmos, i watch the mufon show, ancient aliens, and ufo hunters, but i never thought i would see anything. i am very rational, i always try to debunk or find a rational answer for things. and yes there are jets flying over in that area constantly, but i saw what i saw, i have never seen anything move so mathematically perfect to one another sitting in one spot. when they were dancing, their movements we're not wavering, they were like a slow jerking motion. never off key, they were in sync throughout the entire dance. i'm sorry i have no pictures 4 videos, so i'm not sure if this was a waste of time or not. thank you for listening have a good day...
content.summary: Maby military, i live between edwards afb, and lockheed. but no noise, 30 mph, im familiar with most aircraft. 1st, danced round each other. then 1 flew over, other stayed hovering bout 3 miles away. i am rational and scientific, either top secret or e.T.

content.detailedDescription:
The day after the perseid meteor shower my dad and myself were outside as we usually are for a "cigarette break" (i don't smoke, but my dad does). thinking back about our rather sad experience with the meteor shower (lacking in a real meteor shower show) i decided i would try look around and perhaps catch a lucky glimpse of a stay meteor. so i left the back porch to get a better view (we have a partial cover over the back porch). unfortunately nothing happened as my dad listened to the radio and puffed away on his cigarette. it wasn't until i walked back to the stairs of the porch and looked up that i caught sight of the object in the distance. its hard for me to describe what exactly i saw happen. the object seemingly was still when i first glances up, then nearly instantly zipped across about one forth of the visible sky in a southern motion before disappearing leaving only the blue white trail that faded quickly there after. the object looked sort of like a a bright metallic acute triangle except the rear of the craft was convex like a half moon and it like it had some sort of ridge near the center of the object. i tried to replicate a very crude drawing of what i saw in ms paint. it wasn't the speed or the odd shape of the craft that got my attention so much as what it left behind when it "moved". it left a bright trail that was white near the center/core and faded light blue toward the edges which seemed really sharp or crisp. the actual trail was maybe 30% wider than the object itself and took around 10 seconds or so to dissipate. after i saw the object i yelled over to my dad who was still on the porch to look up (the porch is partially covered with slats) at the sky. by the time he looked up there really wasn't much to see except for he "may" have seen the light left behind from the object. 

i selected to be anonymous to help protect my identity online. however, if you need to contact me i can be reached by phone. thank you.
content.summary: Acute triangular metallic object

content.detailedDescription: This area is frequently used by national guard for exercises. no helicoptors that night  but at least three fly over by choppers  same path next day just not as low.
content.summary: Drifting orange glowing round object, slow moving no sound

content.detailedDescription:
After teaching a scuba diving class 6 of my class went and were sitting watching the ocean relaxing when acraft came in from south to west then after descending moved east towards shore descended more came to a hover apro 10-15 yards above the ocean cast bright green luminous triangle downward to ocean sat there a couple minutes as if beaming a perfect triangle to the ocean then  ascended and shot off at upward ne direction. perfect green triangle "fog"emitted stayed in air for 5 min after craft ascended and disapeared. despite a light breeze the green triangle haze omitted from the craft stayed in place for 5-10 minutes   before disapiting. monday i contacted the coastguard requesting information and was told it had been reported from la to the sanoma coast and was a test rocket fired from southern ca. there is no way this object could have been made on this planet  much less have been a rocket given the actions of the ufo, complete silence and instant movements and trajectory at its departure to space. i list 6 witt eases as that is the number of divers from my class that were present with me that observed the ufo, however as stated the coastguard had sightings reported from la to as far north as our location north of sanfrancisco.
re
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo witnessed by divers after open water ocean dive

content.detailedDescription:
Witness stepped outside his ground floor apartment for a smoke and observed a pulsating red, orange, yellow light in the western sky that was moving steadily from south ot north for about 2.5 minutes, then abruptly changed to a westerly direction and disappeared within 30 seconds. the light resembled a cd which shimmers and displays different colors when it moves. 

witness was surprised when he first saw the light but not traumatized. he had observed other ufos in his earlier life but couldnt remember details about them. 

witness took a photo of the object with his cell phone, which is attacjed as jordan.Ufo, file 1. hand movement during the photo made the photo blurry and not a good representation of the object seen with the eye.
content.summary: Witness observed a pulsating red, orange, yellow light in the western sky that was moving steadily from south ot north, then abruptly changed to a westerly direction and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: So i was at the resort grand palladium in jamaica with my family for a nice vacation that my grand father paid for. it was just me my mom my step dad and sister, we did one of those fancy restaurants every night i think the called <a la cartes> we went to one called poseidon something i don't remember the full name we were seated at our table on a outdoor bar patio type thing overlooking the ocean. my mom pointed out all the stray cats they had in jamaica all around the resort, she pointed one out behind me i looked at the cat and then look up at the ocean admiring it. all of a sudden i spotted 5 glowing orbs in the sky flying in what had seemed like a triangle formation, i immediately pointed it out to my parents.They brushed it off as military jets.I was frightened yet memorized with the fact how 5 objects could be flying so close in triangle formation they were just to close to be jets. also jets make very loud noises and these object were not super high in the sky and they did not emit any sound what so ever. the 5 perfect spheres traveled in a straight line over the ocean. they just kept on going and going and going until they where gone they just disappeared.
content.summary: I was 12 me and my family where eating dinner at our resort all of a sudden i notice the 5 ligths in the sky

content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 31, 2010 at around 2am i was with a friend in front of my house, having a conversation before she left for the night. we we looking in the sky when i saw three red lights in the form of a triangle, no craft was visible, but it was dark. i observed the lights in an instant begin to spin, when then gave the appearance of one large red circle, after that it darted off into the sky out of view in an instant. after that i looked to my friend and asked her if she had saw it, she said she had and described the same thing that i did. what i find interesting is that we both saw the same thing. this all happened in only about a minute an a half. hope this helps or if anyone has any questions please feel free to contact me, thanks!
content.summary: Red trianlge that was stationary then spun in a cirlce and left

content.detailedDescription: I was chilling at the river with my friend. i felt as if we were being watched but im always paranoid, i did notice some splashing in the water near us, but my friend claimed he didn't hear it (he's very unobservant). we were sitting close to a bridge and cars were passing by. then at a moment where there were no cars, we both noticed a small yellow light hovering above the trees and began questioning what it was. soon the orb turned bright white and began to expand as it rose up on a blue beam of light. as the shape became more defined it looked exactly like a space ship from the movies. it looked like a saucer from the front with blinking blue and white lights on the bottom where i assumed the door was. it hovered for a small moment then flew over us, i could tell it had a more winged shape and it had red lights on the bottom. i could feel it's vibrations and it's energy and as it flew over my head i thought i might be abducted.I'm glad i wasn't.
content.summary: Was at river late at nightm noticed small yellow orb, then changed into spaceship

content.detailedDescription: I can't remember the exact date and year, but i was about 7-10 years old at that time, and it was a summer month. i'm 16 now, but i still remember it. i was at a birthday party at a classmate's house. it was a sleepover, and her house was in the rural area of the city. it was about 1 o'clock at night, and we were all going out to stargaze. we all laid on the trampoline, and just looked up at the sky. a couple of minutes went by, and then a flat disc-like object flew over us. the object was close enough for us to see details, like it looked that it was made of metal. i think the object may have been about 50 metres up in the air, or maybe even less. the object was flying in a straight path. it had 3 white lights, arranged in a triangle on it's underside/belly. i don't know if it was the whole object that spun, or if it were only the lights. but it spun. it made a low buzz/humming sound. it didn't flew very fast, i think the sightning lasted for about 2-4 minutes. we lost sight of it, as it flew towards the horizon. we didn't panic, we just felt puzzled. but later that night we felt a little unsettled, but i think that's normal for kids in that age. we tried to search the sky for the object a little later that night, but we didn't see it again.
content.summary: Saw a disc-like object at a birthday party/sleepover.

content.detailedDescription:
In an effort to show my friend in australia the beautiful sky in edmonton, alberta, canada i may have inadvertantly captured something on an iphone 6 camera. all summer i've been going out on my balcony at sunset and taking three shots, close, medium and far to demonstrate perspective.  this morning when i put them on my computer i saw something in the second picture of the august 28,2015 sunset i hadn't noticed before.

there's a dot in the top third of the screen that isn't in the first, too low, or the third?  i took all three pictures within 3 seconds because that is my habit.  what do you think?
content.summary: In the second of three consecutive photos of an edmonton sunset on a iphone 6 i noticed a dot in the upper third of the sceen.
